nodes.text: The YV-26 Starforged blaster rifle was a model of blaster rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. It was a similar model to the YV-24 Starforged blaster rifle, but featured an extension on its barrel.
The weapon would see widespread use among soldiers and technicians in the Eternal Alliance.
The YV-26 Starforged blaster rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Master's Shadow Pack.
